meanings.definition: A person who collaborates with another in writing.
meanings.sent1: The cowriter helped me with my story.
meanings.sent2: The cowriter and I worked together on the project.
meanings.sent3: The cowriter had a great sense of humor, making writing fun.
meanings.sent4: She was the cowriter of my success story.
meanings.sent5: The cowriter's creativity brought the characters to life.

meanings.definition: To write (a script, book, etc.) in collaboration with another person.
meanings.sent1: I cowritered the screenplay with my friend.
meanings.sent2: They cowritered a best-selling novel together.
meanings.sent3: We cowritered the script over coffee and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas cowritered a new chapter in our writing journey.
meanings.sent5: Cowritering with him was a rewarding experience.
